messages.content: Hi, is Wi-Fi available in the apartment?
Hi there! This particular apartment doesn’t have Wi-Fi. If you’re planning to work or stream, let me know, and I’d be happy to point you toward some great cafes or spots nearby with fast internet.
What’s the check-in and check-out time?
TCheck-in is from 3:00 PM onward, and check-out is by 12:00 PM. If you need a little extra time on either end, just let me know, and I’ll see what I can do!
How many people can stay here?
The apartment is designed for one guest, making it perfect if you’re traveling solo and want a quiet, comfortable space to yourself.
Are pets allowed?
Thanks for asking! To keep the space allergy-friendly, I’m not allowing pets at this time. Hope that works for you!
What’s the cancellation policy?
The cancellation policy is strict, meaning last-minute cancellations might not be refundable. If you’re still finalizing plans, let me know, and I can help you sort out what works best.
How much is it for a week?
It’s $100 per night, so for seven nights, it’d be $700 total. I think it’s a great deal for such a convenient Brooklyn spot!
Is this place suitable for kids?
Absolutely, it’s marked as suitable for kids and infants. Just a heads-up: it’s a smaller apartment, so it’s ideal for lighter travel.
What type of bed is in the apartment?
It’s a standard, comfy bed—perfect for relaxing after a day out in the city. I want to make sure you’re well-rested!
Can I book this last minute?
Definitely! Same-day bookings are fine as long as they’re confirmed before noon. Just let me know if you’re in a pinch!
Is there a cleaning fee?
Nope, I’ve kept things simple—no extra cleaning fee here. What you see in the price is exactly what you’ll pay.
What’s nearby the apartment?

Oh, you’re going to love the location! It’s right on Berry Street in Williamsburg, Brooklyn. You’ve got trendy cafes, amazing restaurants, and local shops just around the corner. If you’re a fan of live music or craft breweries, you’re in for a treat!
How do I check in?
Check-in starts at 3:00 PM. I’ll send you clear instructions closer to your arrival—it’s a smooth process, promise.
Is there a deposit?
Nope, no deposit required. Just book and enjoy!
What happens if I bring an extra person?
The space is really tailored for one person, but if you’re considering having someone join, let me know in advance. There’s a $10 nightly fee for an additional guest.
Does this place have a star rating?
Not yet—it’s a new listing! But I’ve made sure it’s clean, cozy, and set up for a great stay. I’d love to hear your thoughts after you’ve experienced it!
Is the bathroom private?
Yes, the bathroom is completely private. You’ll have it all to yourself!
Can I cancel if my plans change?
I get it—plans can change. This listing has a strict cancellation policy, so it’s good to double-check your dates before booking. Let me know if you have any questions!
Is the apartment clean?
Absolutely. I always make sure it’s spotless before a guest arrives. You’ll walk into a fresh, welcoming space!
Can I stay for just one night?
The apartment has a three-night minimum stay, so one night wouldn’t work for this listing. Let me know if you’re planning a longer visit—I’d love to host you!
What is the address of property 41?
The address of property 347 is 321 Birch Lane.
What type of place is this?
It’s a private apartment—you’ll have the whole space to yourself. It’s perfect for some peace and quiet in a busy city like Brooklyn
Hi, is Wi-Fi available at this property?
Hey! There’s no Wi-Fi listed for this guesthouse, but if it’s something you need during your stay, I can recommend a local SIM card or nearby places with great connectivity.
What’s the check-in and check-out time?
Check-in is anytime after midnight, and check-out is by midnight on your departure day. If you need specific timings or flexibility, just let me know!
How many bathrooms are there?
There are two private bathrooms in the guesthouse—one for each bedroom, so you’ll have plenty of space.
What’s the price for two nights?
The nightly rate is 1,500$. Since there’s a two-night minimum, that would be 3,000$ for your stay.
Is there air conditioning in the property?
Yes, the guesthouse has air conditioning to keep you comfortable no matter the weather.
What is the lot size of property 888?
The lot size of property 422 is 1 acre.
Can I watch TV there?
Definitely! There’s cable TV available, so you can relax and enjoy some entertainment during your stay.
Is the property big enough for long stays?
Yes, it’s perfect for long-term stays. The guesthouse is spacious, about 560 square meters, and you’ve got everything you’d need for an extended visit.
Are there cleaning services?
Yes, cleaning before checkout is included. If you’d like additional cleaning during your stay, let me know, and I can help arrange it for you.
How many people can stay here?
The guesthouse is set up for two guests, with two bedrooms and two beds, making it ideal for couples or friends traveling together.
Is there a deposit?
No deposit is required—it’s a straightforward booking process.
Can I book this property for just one night?
The guesthouse has a two-night minimum stay, so it wouldn’t be available for a single night.
Is it possible to book last minute?
Yes, last-minute bookings are fine as long as they’re made before noon on the day of arrival. Let me know if you’re in a hurry, and I’ll make sure it’s ready for you!
How far is it from public transport?
I don’t have exact details on public transport nearby, but the area is well-connected. If you need help finding routes or options, just ask!
Is the property clean?
I always ensure it’s thoroughly cleaned before every guest arrives, so you’ll walk into a fresh and spotless space.
Does property 577 have a swimming pool?
Property 418 has a swimming pool.
Are pets allowed here?
I don’t allow pets at this property, just to keep it comfortable for all future guests.
Is this place suitable for families?
The guesthouse is better suited for two adults, but if you have specific needs, let me know, and I’ll see how I can accommodate.
Can I check in early?
If no one’s checking out the same day, I’m happy to arrange an early check-in for you. Just let me know your timing, and I’ll confirm.
What’s nearby this place?
The guesthouse is located on Cooper Drive, which is a peaceful area. If you’re looking for recommendations for dining or activities, just ask—I’d be happy to help!
Does this property have any outdoor space?
The property is quite spacious overall, but it doesn’t have a designated outdoor area listed. If you’re looking for a place to relax outside, I’d be happy to share nearby options.
Is there parking available?
Parking isn’t listed, but if you’re driving, let me know, and I’ll help you figure out the best nearby options.
Is this apartment in a safe neighborhood?
Yes, it’s in a great part of the city—safe and lively, with everything you need close by. You’ll feel right at home here.
Can I book the apartment for one night only?
Yes, absolutely! There’s just a one-night minimum, so short stays are no problem at all.
Does the price include taxes?
Yes, the price you see—$250.50 per night—includes everything, with no additional taxes or fees added.
What’s the exact location of this apartment?
The apartment is located in Fort Worth, TX, 76107. I’ll share the full address once your booking is confirmed.
Can more than two people stay here?
The space is designed for two guests, but if you have extra people joining, it’s $50 per night for each additional guest after two. Let me know, and I’ll help you adjust the booking!
Are there any restaurants or shops nearby?
TYes, the apartment is in the heart of the city, so you’ll find plenty of restaurants, cafes, and shops within walking distance. I’d be happy to recommend some favorites!
How many bedrooms are there?
There are three bedrooms in total, giving you plenty of space to spread out and relax.
Is this place quiet at night?
Yes, despite being in the city center, the apartment is in a peaceful area, so you can count on a good night’s sleep.
Does the apartment have Wi-Fi?
Wi-Fi isn’t listed as an amenity for this apartment. If you need connectivity during your stay, let me know, and I’ll suggest some alternatives
Can I bring my own cleaning supplies?
You’re welcome to, but the apartment is cleaned before every checkout, so you’ll arrive to a spotless space.
What’s the parking situation like?
The listing doesn’t mention parking, but if you’re driving, I’d be happy to help you find nearby options or recommend a good spot.
Can I check in late at night?
Check-in starts at 12:00 PM, but if you’re arriving late, let me know in advance, and I’ll make sure everything’s set for you.
Is there a washer and dryer in the apartment?
The listing doesn’t mention a washer or dryer, so I’d recommend planning for alternatives nearby. If you’d like, I can suggest some great laundry services close to the apartment. Just let me know!
How do I pick up the keys?
I’ll give you all the key pickup details closer to your check-in date, so everything is seamless for you.
Is there a balcony or outdoor space?
The listing doesn’t mention outdoor spaces, but the apartment is lovely inside, and you’ll have plenty to explore nearby.
What’s the cancellation policy?
It’s set to a strict cancellation policy, so cancellations close to the check-in date wouldn’t be refundable.
Is the apartment pet-friendly?
The listing doesn’t specify whether pets are allowed, so I’d recommend leaving furry friends at home for this one
Are the bedrooms all the same size?
The listing doesn’t mention specific details about the bedrooms, but with three of them, there’s plenty of room to spread out comfortably.
Is there a minimum age requirement to book?
There aren’t any age requirements listed, but I’d say it’s perfect for adults or families looking for a city getaway.
